LocalControlContext.Comment: Updates the indicator numbers of open requests, attestation cases and approval cases.

Function.Name: listselect(object tablename, bound(tablename) string columnname)
Function.Expression: isnullorempty( concat( select distinct "'"+columnname+"'" from tablename, ', ' ), "''")

Function.Name: listselect(object tablename, bound(tablename) string columnname, bound(tablename) bool whereclause)
Function.Expression: isnullorempty( concat( select distinct "'"+columnname+"'" from tablename where whereclause, ', ' ), "''")

Function.Name: listselect(object tablename, bound(tablename) string columnname, bound(tablename) bool whereclause, string delimiter)
Function.Expression: isnullorempty( concat( select distinct delimiter+columnname+delimiter from tablename where whereclause, ', ' ), (delimiter+delimiter))

Function.Name: listselect(object tablename, bound(tablename) string columnname, bound(tablename) bool whereclause, string delimiter, string seperator)
Function.Expression: isnullorempty( concat( select distinct delimiter+columnname+delimiter from tablename where whereclause, seperator ), (delimiter+delimiter) )
